text: @BorisJohnson Alert to what exactly? Roving squadrons of Covid-19 bombers? Coronavirus fifth columnists? This isn’t a jolly b&w, stiff-upper-lip Alec Guinness war movie you cretinous blathering plum. You don’t beat a virus by “alertness” you beat it by DOING something. You wet, pointless arse.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
